Comments
November 13, 2022
DarkTortoise23
Scott here takes some finesse to use, but sometimes he's just what a team needs. Have him start adjacent to one of your melee monsters(say nova for guardians of the galaxy)melee monster charges while carrying an empower piece, and after resolutions drop ant man in, outwit defense if necessary, and finish off with a precision swing for 3 after the empower. At 35 points, he brings a lot more utility than some may give him credit for.
